content: The **first Goh Chok Tong Cabinet** was formed after then-Prime Minister [Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong) was sworn in after the previous Prime Minister, [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew), stepped down and handed over prime ministership to Goh on 28 November 1990. ## Cabinet The First Goh Chok Tong Cabinet consisted of the following members.
